title: BI Portfolio
text:
Disclaimer



By nature, it is challenging to build a business intelligence portfolio since most BI work is generated for internal company use. Examples on this page are a small subset of my work that is publicly available. I hope to add more to this portfolio in the near future.

title: BI Portfolio
section: Utah Transit Authority - Free Fare February Report
text:
Utah Transit Authority - Free Fare February Report






UTA declared “Free Fare February” (FFF) in 2022, granting free access to all public transit modes (bus, light rail, commuter rail, and more). A large increase in ridership (>20%) was observed as a result, leading to nationwide interest in a post-mortem report.Using Power BI, I generated all the data visualizations for the FFF report. I also read and manually categorized about 2,000 customer comments for sentiment analysis.

title: Hi, I’m Caleb.
text: My passion is creating consensus by architecting and developing enterprise-scale, end-to-end analytical solutions.
